name: Pixel Tournament 2014
description:
Description

Pixel Tournament was created for Low Rez Jam 2014 where the goal was to create a game with a maximum screen resolution of 32x32 pixels. For playability the game is upscale to 320 x 320.

The goal of Pixel Tournament 2014 is to knock as many opponents of the level without falling off. This is done by using your trustworthy pixel gun. Shoot your opponents of the level and try and stay on. Good luck!

Controls

Movement:
WASD keys

Shoot:
Arrow keys
